Data Source: https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Forest+Fires

***

Overview: 
Data is taken from Montesinho Park in Portugal. There are 13 separate variables found in the dataset. X-Spatial coordinate, Y-Spatial coordinate, Month, Day, FFMC, DMC, DC, ISI, Temp, RH (relative humidity), Wind, Rain, Area.
Variable "FFMC" is a numeric rating that measures the moisture content of litter and other fuels (Ranges from 0-101). Variable "DMC" is a numeric rating of average moisture content of loosely compacted organic layers of moderate depth. Variable "DC" is a numeric rating of the average moisture content of deep, compact organic layers. Variable "ISI" is a numeric rating of the expected rate of fire spread.
